channel.title: Egypt on My Sherlock Holmes library
channel.description: Recent content in Egypt on My Sherlock Holmes library

item.title: The Scroll of the Dead
item.description: Author: David Stuart Davies Pipes: 3/5 Holmes and Watson are searching for an Egyptian papyrus that is said to hold the secret about immortality. Other people are looking for it too, they will do anything to get hold of it. A novel i the traditional style that manages to stay in character of the original short stories althoug being longer.
